product_name: REI All Season Tech Compatible Gloves - Boys'
long_description: The durable REI All Season Tech Compatible gloves feature conductive material on the thumbs and index fingers, letting boys use touch-screen phones and tablets while keeping their hands warm. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers allows you to send text messages and operate your touch screen without having to remove your gloves. Polyester hard-face fleece with a touch of spandex provides a snug fit, water repellency, wind resistance and breathability. Silicone pattern on the palms improves grip.
